comment: Alou Diarra (French pronunciation: ​[a.lu dja.ʁa] ; born 15 July 1981) is a French international footballer who currently plays for West Ham United in the Premier League. He primarily plays as a defensive midfielder, but can also deputise as a centre-back if necessary. Diarra is described as a player who is "strong, athletic and very powerful" and possesses a "combative edge" similar to former French international Patrick Vieira.
